Detailed Description

Class that contains IP Addresses, hostname, aliases of a host.

IPHostEntry is immutable once it has been constructed. The IPHostEntry class associates a Domain Name System (DNS) host name with a list of aliases and matching IP addresses. If the specified host has multiple entries in the DNS database, IpHostEntry contains multiple IP addresses and aliases. The IpHostEntry class is used as a helper class with the Dns class.

See also:
DNS, IDNSListener.
